text: Create a List that contain each Line of a File
I'm trying to open a file and afterwards create a list with each line read from the file.

code:
i=0
   List=[""]
   for Line in inFile:
      List[i]=Line.split(",")
      i+=1

text: But this sample code gives me an error because of the i+=1 saying that index is out of range.
How can I write the code in order to increment my list with every new Line in the InFile?
